actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to prescribe regulations relating to the purchase, possession, consumption, use, and transportation of alcoholic beverages in the Canal Zone.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to prescribe regulations relating to the purchase, possession, consumption, use, and transportation of alcoholic beverages by individuals under eighteen years of age in the Canal Zone. Authorizes the President to prescribe regulations for the manufacture and sale, and importation and exportation of alcoholic beverages in the Canal Zone.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to prescribe regulations relating to the purchase, possession, consumption, use, and transportation of alcoholic beverages in the Canal Zone.
